urls.title: JBA Bentley wins health and safety prize at CECA Yorkshire & Humber Awards
urls.description: JBA Bentley enjoyed a night of success at the Civil Engineering Contractors Association (CECA) Awards in Yorkshire and Humber, winning the esteemed Linda Grant Health and Safety Award for the very first time. JBA Bentley - an integrated design and build contractor comprising the environmental engineering expertise of JBA Consulting and contracting experience of JN Bentley - was presented with the Linda Grant Health and Safety Award for their flood alleviation work undertaken between Winteringham
